CustomField.formula: IF(ISBLANK( NextStep ), 0, 0.08) + IF(ISBLANK( Customer_Incentive__c ), 0, 0.08) + IF(ISBLANK( Executive_Presentation_Performed__c ), 0, 0.08) + IF(ISBLANK( Admin_Champ_Contact_Complete__c ), 0, 0.08) + IF(ISBLANK( Administrative_Champ_Contact_Notes__c ), 0, 0.08) + IF(ISBLANK( Clinical_Champ_Contact_Complete__c ), 0, 0.08) + IF(ISBLANK( Clinical_Contact_Notes__c ), 0, 0.08) + IF( ISBLANK(Final_Decision_Maker_Contact_Complete__c) , 0, 0.08) + IF(ISBLANK( Final_Decision_Maker_Contact_Notes__c ), 0, 0.08) + IF( !Executive_Support__c , 0, 0.09) + IF(ISBLANK( Implementation_Plan_Notes__c ), 0, 0.09) + CASE( VAC_Approval_Required__c , "NA", 0.1, "Y", IF( ISBLANK(VAC_Approval_Date__c), 0.05, 0.1) ,0)
CustomField.label: Opp Health %
